scenes.background: Bob looks thoughtful, considering the implications of quick decisions.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'We really don't have much time to waste here, team.'

options.text: I think we can find a middle ground that addresses both speed and thoroughness.
options.analysis: You propose a balanced approach, showing empathy and perception by valuing both speed and thorough planning.

options.text: Monica, maybe a quick decision isn't as risky as it seems.
options.analysis: You lean towards supporting Alex's perspective, showing good self-regulation and social skills in handling the disagreement.

options.text: It's crucial to avoid hasty decisions; let's prioritize a detailed plan.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of thorough planning, reflecting good motivation and social skills.
